text: even at school in games or at work i've
always enjoyed the feeling of working my
way through tough problems and finding
the best ways to solve them that's why i
choose a career in it so i could exactly
do that for customers
today i'm a solutions architect guiding
enterprise manufacturing customers and
using aws cloud to best solve their
business challenges this can be done by
navigating them through aws services
that best match their needs helping them
porting existing on-premises workloads
to the cloud or designing cloud native
solutions from scratch
as enterprise solutions architect we
provide accurate and deep technical
guidance when required but at the same
time we need to help our customers team
build and promote their projects
internally working in it sometimes it is
difficult to see the direct impact of
your work but as an aws solutions
architect the impact can be really
concrete
for example working with automotive
customers one important topic is
autonomous driving and how it makes
day-to-day drivers life more secure and
comfortable while helping our cars
become more ecologically friendly
i think the most exciting parts of my
job are the sheer diversity of my
day-to-day engagements and building a
real trustful relationships with my
customer
i don't know many other jobs where you
can really feel like you are a part of
your customer teams you're working with
